pullrequest.title: Added support for removing sensors at runtime

content.raw: The CreateSensor function is private in the sensors system so should be fine. Here are some minor suggestions in the [remove\_sensors\_migration](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/e17b7bde269a479320dc7f302793bdbb0e6b656e) branch, mainly just to list out API change in a format similar to [gazebo’s migration guide](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/gazebo11/Migration.md). Can you take a look and merge if that looks good to you? thanks
content.html: The CreateSensor function is private in the sensors system so should be fine. Here are some minor suggestions in the remove_sensors_migration branch, mainly just to list out API change in a format similar to gazebo’s migration guide. Can you take a look and merge if that looks good to you? thanks
